our_games.title: Dreadtides
our_games.text_presentation: Dreadtides is a strategy game set in a post-apocalyptic fantasy world. Explore a world lost to corruption, harness its resources, research lost technology, and protect your people. Can you build a city capable of defeating a magical cataclysm ?

our_games.title: Adventurlnn
our_games.text_presentation: Our next game is coming soon
